Data Management#

Data Management Utilities Module#

This module provides utility functions for managing and organizing data in influencer games. It includes functions for loading Q-tables, extracting data parameters, creating directory structures, and generating file names for saving and retrieving data.

Usage:#

The q_table_data_load function loads Q-tables and configuration data, while the data_directory function creates directory structures based on data parameters. The data_final_name function generates full file paths for saving data.

Example:#

from InflGame.utils.data_management import q_table_data_load, data_final_name

# Define options for loading Q-tables
options = {
    "agents": 3,
    "reach": "small",
    "modes": 2,
    "density": True
}

# Load Q-table and configurations
q_table, configs = q_table_data_load(options=options)
print("Q-table loaded:", q_table)
print("Configurations loaded:", configs)

# Define data parameters
data_parameters = {
    "num_agents": "3_agents",
    "data_type": "q_tables",
    "reach": "sig_50",
    "resource_type": "gaussian",
    "steps": "100_states"
}

# Generate final file names
file_names = data_final_name(data_parameters=data_parameters, name_ads=["experiment1"], save_types=[".hkl"])
print("Generated file names:", file_names)

Functions

InflGame.utils.data_management.data_directory(data_parameters, alt_name)#

Creates a directory structure based on data parameters.

Parameters:

  • data_parameters (dict) – Dictionary containing data parameters.

  • alt_name (bool) – Whether to use an alternative name.

Returns:

The final directory path.

Return type:

str

InflGame.utils.data_management.data_final_name(data_parameters, name_ads, save_types=['.hkl'])#

Generates the final file names with directory paths.

Parameters:

  • data_parameters (dict) – Dictionary containing data parameters.

  • name_ads (list) – List of additional name components.

  • save_types (list) – List of file extensions (default is [‘.hkl’]).

Returns:

A list of full file paths.

Return type:

list

InflGame.utils.data_management.data_name(data_parameters, name_ads, save_types)#

Generates data file names based on parameters and additional names.

Parameters:

  • data_parameters (dict) – Dictionary containing data parameters.

  • name_ads (list) – List of additional name components.

  • save_types (list) – List of file extensions.

Returns:

A list of generated file names.

Return type:

list

InflGame.utils.data_management.data_parameters(configs, data_type, resource_type)#

Extracts data parameters from the configuration file.

Parameters:

  • configs (dict) – Configuration dictionary.

  • data_type (str) – Type of data (‘q_tables’ or ‘configs’).

  • resource_type (str) – Type of resource.

Returns:

A dictionary containing data parameters.

Return type:

dict

InflGame.utils.data_management.q_table_data_load(options)#

Reads the Q-table and configuration data from specified paths.

Parameters:

options (dict) – A dictionary containing the following keys: - agents (str): Number of agents. - reach (str): Reach type (‘small’ or ‘large’). - modes (str): Modes of operation. - density (bool): Whether the data is dense.

Returns:

A tuple containing the Q-table and configuration data.

Return type:

dict
